post_content:
For Sale T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait Piedmont 150 PSA 4.5. The price below includes shipping. Please email [url]wiseguycards@gmail.com[/url] or shoot me a PM if you are interested or have any questions. I am looking for a handful of HOF portraits (Including the Mathewson) in centered SGC 4-4.5s. If you have any available, I would be potentially interested in taking in trade. 

•T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait PSA 4.5 $5000
